      • loadUserByUsername

        @Transactional(propagation=REQUIRES_NEW)
public org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetails loadUserByUsername(String userAccountName)
        Load the external user which has the userAccountClass and external user name. If the user does not exist in the database create a new external user record with a generated consumer key and consumer secret.
        Specified by:
        loadUserByUsername in interface org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetailsService
        Parameters:
        userAccountName - The external user name to login as.
        Returns:
        The UserDetals object for the user.
